text: Stephen James Merchant (born 24 November 1974) is a British actor, comedian, director and writer. He is best known for his works with Ricky Gervais and Karl Pilkington. With Gervais, he created the popular BBC sitcoms The Office and Extras. He has appeared in movies such as Run, Fat Boy, Run, Hot Fuzz (both 2000), Movie 43 (2006) and Logan (2010). He also voiced Wheatley in the video game Portal 2 (2011). Merchant was born in Hanham, Bristol, England. He is a graduate of the University of Warwick. He stands at 6 ft 7 in (200 cm). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Bristol Category:British stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from Bristol Category:English movie actors Category:English radio personalities Category:English television actors Category:English television producers Category:English television writers
title: Stephen Merchant
